Detailed Description

An example for legal vertex format.

Use XFCGL_VERTEX as vertex format flags. XFCGL_VERTEX is defined as (XFCGLVF_XYZ | XFCGLVF_NORMAL | XFCGLVF_TEXTURE1).

See also:
XFCGL_VERTEX
